raw_body: PAUL – MARY RANJANI IVY – Beloved wife of late Bro. Paul Pandian,​ loving mother of Daisy,​ Thomas,​ Hepsy and Peter,​ fond mother-in-law of Dany,​ Gorden and Shanthini,​ grandmother of Angelo and Shalini,​ Angeline (Sis Nesam),​ Deborah,​ Rozanne,​ Karen and Hannah,​ great grandmother of Ashen and Jodash. Remains lie at A.F. Raymond’s Funeral Parlour on 17th October from 8.00 a.m. onwards. Funeral Service will be held at the Parlour at 2.30 p.m. Cortege leaves Parlour therafter for burial at 4.00 p.m. at Christ Church,​ No.137,​ Mission Road,​ Kotte.066584
